content: Hi, demo does not have input option for xml. any specific reason? or if a FhirPath expression validated against JSON input also make is valid for xml input?

The fhirpath.js library itself only takes JSON for the input resource. I think most FHIR servers can either output XML or JSON formatted resources, so we did not see a need to add a FHIR XML to JSON converter to fhirpath.js.
